title: Hello My Shining Love
overview: The story is about two successful people who are professionals in their fields of activity. Despite the emotional scars of the past, they embark on a unique journey of mutual healing with love, which reveals each other's bright personalities. Once a strong girl, Dugu Rongan reached the bottom after she was betrayed by her own artist Song Ji Hao and her own employees. Unwilling to accept defeat, she vows to return one day. The girl puts all her strength into creating the star Sid and gets a second chance to return to business. At the same time, she meets Ji Mo, the sharp-tongued president of the company, and their unexpected meeting paves the way for a dizzying romance.
